column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I am just not a fan of tapas
column3: I go too. I just hate the idea of paying $8 for a couple of shrimp that everyone has to fight over and being the polite one
column4: I go last and get scraps but then have to split the bill evenly. So
column5: the last two times I've been here
column6: I've ordered my own plates. But that still means I'm spending $30 on two skewers of meat
column7: and a glass or two of sangria. I admit the portions here are a little better than some places
column8: though I think this place is hyped up a bit more and so is more expensive than maybe Cafe Iberico which has even better portions and prices.
